attributes.action: change their drug laws to an evidence based one.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am asking the Prime Minister to please reform our current drug laws and to replace them with a science based rating system.
I believe that the current system is outdated and is not working.
There needs to be a fresh start and hopefully if it is evidence based people will start believing what politicians say about the subject.
